revised_title: Angular Power Spectrum and Auto-Correlation Function of Waves in Irregular Refracting Medium
tldr: The authors study the diffraction of waves passing through an irregular refracting medium and derive a relation between the angular power spectrum and the auto-correlation function describing the irregularities of the diffraction field. They discuss the special case of an isotropic screen and consider multiple scattering caused by volume irregularities of the dielectric constant. The results are applied to problems in radio-wave propagation.
